direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods have identical parameter structures and similar internal logic, differing only in the endpoint they call.
Both methods retrieve market data but for different purposes (candlestick data vs. aggregated trades).
Both methods access market data but for different types of information (candlestick data vs. order book depth).
Both methods handle similar exceptions related to parameter validation and API request failures.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized before making API requests.
Environment setup is required before making API requests, similar to the setup needed for klines.
Both methods need to verify the format of the API response, ensuring it matches expected structures.
